name: dittofeed
tagline: A self-hosted platform for managing customer messaging and engagement campaigns
description: Dittofeed is a self-hosted platform for customer engagement through email and messaging campaigns. It includes segmentation, automated workflows, templates, and analytics, designed for marketing teams.

features.title: Email Campaigns
features.description: Create and send targeted email marketing. Engage customers effectively

features.title: Automated Workflows
features.description: Trigger messages based on user actions. Smart engagement automation

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track campaign performance and engagement. Data-driven decisions

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your customer engagement platform. Complete data privacy and control
